import React, { useState } from 'react'; import API from '../utils/API'; import Table from './components/Table' import Searchbox from './components/Searchbox' const Recipe = ({profile}) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [ingredients, setIngredients] = useState(""); const [directions, setDirections]= useState(""); const formSubmit =event=>{ event.preventDefault(); const newRecipe={title:title , ingrediants:ingredients, instructions: directions} API.addRecipe(newRecipe) .then(res=>console.log(res)) console.log(title, ingredients, directions) } return (
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setIngredients(e.target.value)}/>
setDirections(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Recipe
